review: First I tried the Fire Stick and it worked fine. Got a chance to get the TV and I'm happy with it! Works well, low power(compared to my other media consumption devices), and just all around a snappy device. I think the UI could use some work or allow for customization, but overall it's a solid buy if you don't already have another way to consume media.
